item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (260 points | 61 comments)
2. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (198 points | 34 comments)
3. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (135 points | 39 comments)
4. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (84 points | 30 comments)
5. Colors of the Court – NBA Uniforms (3 points | discuss)
6. Aviator (YC S21) Is hiring engineers to build a DevEx platform ( | hide)
7. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (124 points | 26 comments)
8. Gravity's Eastern Voyage (5 points | discuss)
9. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (137 points | 80 comments)
10. The evolution of nepotism in academia, 1088-1800 (44 points | 43 comments)
11. Elwood Edwards, Voice of AOL's 'You've Got Mail ' Alert, Dies at 74 (69 points | 15 comments)
12. The 'Invisibility Cloak' – Slash-Proc Magic (33 points | 2 comments)
13. Show HN: Nondeterministic finite queued dialog automaton (7 points | discuss)
14. Claude Shannon: Mathematician, Engineer, Genius and Juggler? (2017) (81 points | 30 comments)
15. Why I love Rust for tokenising and parsing (254 points | 179 comments)
16. Toy Models of Superposition (2022) (3 points | discuss)
17. First image of our Milky Way's black hole may be inaccurate, scientists say (10 points | 2 comments)
18. Launch HN: Codebuff (YC F24) – CLI tool that writes code for you (270 points | 225 comments)
19. Using Ghidra and Python to reverse engineer Ecco the Dolphin (433 points | 118 comments)
20. Functional Programming in Go (11 points | discuss)
21. Practical Radio Circuits (2003) [pdf] (115 points | 27 comments)
22. The Charms of Catastrophe (1978) (10 points | 3 comments)
23. How to Self-Host All of Bluesky (22 points | 5 comments)
24. Consistently faster and smaller compressed bitmaps with Roaring (2016) (45 points | 4 comments)
25. Functional ultrasound through the skull (229 points | 78 comments)
26. The Weeds Are Winning (16 points | 17 comments)
27. Mushroom Color Atlas (293 points | 29 comments)
28. AI for real-time fusion plasma behavior prediction and manipulation (266 points | 136 comments)
29. Show HN: Draw.Audio – A musical sketchpad using the Web Audio API (194 points | 64 comments)
30. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (213 points | 67 comments)
